name: U.A.D.S - Untitled Asteroid Defence Simulator: Final Release
name_original: U.A.D.S - Untitled Asteroid Defence Simulator: Final Release
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Try to save the entire Earth's population from our planet's impending crash with a giant asteroid.

Rotate the Earth to find a place for your buildings. Remember: the space is limited!

Use the rocket launchers to push the asteroid back and get just a little bit of time.

Use the evacuation ships to evacuate as many people as you can.

Use the factories to produce money for your everyday expenses... Like five or six rocket launchers.

Beware! Evacuate all the people as fast as you can because the Asteroid speeds up every second!

The game is currently free, but it might change to a donation in the future.
